welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Winnetka, a charming and picturesque city known for its beautiful beaches, quaint shops, and friendly community. We invite you to explore our town and soak in all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is exclusively for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for United Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for Delta Air Lines and Air Canada.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for American Airlines, Alaska Airlines, and several others.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights for various airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Memorial Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Memorial Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights operated by Southwest Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights operated by Delta Air Lines, Porter Airlines, and Volaris.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights operated by American Airlines, Frontier Airlines, and Spirit Airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Dupage County Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Dupage County Airport caters to private and corporate aircraft, providing a luxurious and exclusive experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free wifi network throughout the terminal.
